issue.title: www.geblitzt.de
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.geblitzt.de/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.geblitzt.de%2F) ### Comment > Can't scroll website. How to reproduce: > > 1. Deactivate AdGuard > 2. Reject cookies > 3. You can now scroll down the website :) ``` Username: @hArDsTyLe2000 ``` ### Screenshots

Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/18vbpznpe3dw8gowssggogcg0gkcgsw94vwu52ejk0.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/lejzxxwgcxwk448kcok4sccs44g8kcwfsmfir6agk8.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser Extension v5.2.700.1 MV2 System version: | `Windows 11` Browser: | Firefox Tracking protection: | **General settings**:
Block trackers,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:
